website_summaries.verdict: Small soil test kit sensor that uses a light system to tell you what to do with your soil.
pros: Has a simple means of giving you instant results from testing using lights, so you can make changes to the soil immediately and help your plants remain healthier
Works with the sPlant app on your smartphone to give you additional plant care advice
cons: Much pricier than other kits on the market

customer_reviews.title: Device does not correctly monitor soil conditions
customer_reviews.text: The device doesn’t work. It kept saying that the soil humidity is low. I have several plants and some of them the soil is dry but the device kept showing blue light even on moist soil. So I then dipped the probes into a glass of water and the blue light blinked. I think one of the reviewers commented on this-as well as the wap code being in Chinese only. I will return the product.
customer_reviews.author: jagjr

customer_reviews.title: Works good!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be working as advertised, haven’t lost any plants yet.
customer_reviews.author: icanfixxit

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Only blinked blue and yellow- even in freshly watered plant. POS- returning.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Ann Cain

customer_reviews.title: Broken when it arrived. Checked the battery, pulled ...
customer_reviews.text: Broken when it arrived. Checked the battery, pulled the tab, read and reread the instuctions, tried it all, nothing worked. Cost more to send it back than just taking the hit.
customer_reviews.author: D. S.

customer_reviews.title: It is cute but inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: pricy for single plant usage as many better priced product available but still very cute though expectations should be low with it

customer_reviews.title: works surprisingly well.
customer_reviews.text: Gotta say, it works well. I'm somewhat surprised but it does! It told me my plant needs fertilizer so I added and the device was satisfied, likewise for water. I'm assuming its accurate,I've been known to kill a few plants in my lifetime but this one is doing well enough!
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't seem to work right. The only time it ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't seem to work right. The only time it said something had enough water was putting it directly into a cup of water...

customer_reviews.title: It would be nice if it works.
customer_reviews.text: I tried to connect this tool with the app, but it didn’t work... the app didn’t recognize the device. And even tho I use fresh water, it keeps showing the orange light.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy with this product. It's not near as sophisticated as it's described to be. Don't bother.

customer_reviews.title: Tester listed all settings the same in each plant I ...

customer_reviews.title: Handy tool if you have lots of plants in pots
customer_reviews.text: I have lots of plants at home. To remember what to water when to fertilize is always challenge. With this little handy tool, you can easily find out if you need to water and/or fertilizer. If there was a switch to turn on/off the test function, that will make this tester more attractive.

customer_reviews.text: This is a very useful tool. Unless you have a lot of knowledge and are very experienced. It’s hard to know the condition of the soil. But this tiny tool will do the work for you. Just plug it into the soil problem solved.

customer_reviews.title: No Bluetooth or WiFi
customer_reviews.text: POS The listing comes up when looking for smart plant along with real Bluetooth connected soil monitoring devices such as the xiami one And despise the company have an app the device doesn’t have Bluetooth It is in the questions and answer but the listing is misleading there is nothing smart about it Even as a regular soil tester it fails blinking blue in a very very watered soil Returning ASAP
customer_reviews.author: Protom

product_meta.title: sPlant Soil Tester, Soil Water Moisture Fertilizer Meter, Soil Test Kit, Soil Pick Tool, Moisture Nutrition Measurement, for Indoor Potted Plants
product_meta.description:
After receiving the goods how to use sPlant soil tester:

Step 1. Open the package and take out the goods, please open the lid without LOGO, remove the transparent plastic sheet insulator, then close the cover.

Step 2. After inserting to the soil, make sure the test rod is inserted into the soil to a sufficient depth and do not to cover the white wavy line.

Step 3. Ensuring that the depth of insertion is correct, add appropriate water to all soil, including the soil around the tester, and wait for the lights to indicate.

Step 4.sPlant detection rod is specially designed for potted plants. Please do not move the detection rod frequently during the testing, just one tester is meant to be with one potted plants.

Please read important instructions carefully before use:

A: Different plants need different nutrition and water, how much water and fertilizer should be added

Solutions:

1. Different plant's specific needs of nutrition and water, how much water and fertilizer should be added, you need to judge according to your own experience or sPlant Apps plant databases.

2. If you really need more accurate functions, you can buy our advanced version of intelligent herb flower pot to do it perfectly.

B: Light displayed roblems after add water or fertilizer, the yellow or blue light is still flashing

Reasons + Solutions:

1. The potted plants soil may be not a conventional soil, and it's loose-leakage sand, then because the soil tester detection touched area with soil is too small, it can’t work properly. So please ensure that the tested soil is dense and burly enough.

Soil Moisture & Nutrition Tester Light Indicator Display:

★ Blue Light: Low Moisture

★ Green Light: Good

★ Orange Light: Low Nutrient

★ Red Light: Chang Batteries
feature_bullets: 【☘️☘️How to Use Quickly（Updated Version）】- When receiving your item, open the white cover without the LOGO side of the tester, then take off the transparent plastic insulation. After that, insert the tester in your potted plants according to the instruction strictly, please do not cover the white wave line, THEN ADD SOME WATER FOR YOUR PLANTS EVENLY.

【☘️☘️Specifications】- sPlant soil tester tool size is 4.33 "x 1.10" x 0.59 ", working by 3Volt CR2032 batteries (button cell, 1 year lifespan). Please put it in a regular temperature between 0 ° C - 40 ° C. Please note, if the soil is loose-leakage sand, rock or hard, then because the soil tester detection area is too small, it can not work properly.

【☘️☘️Plants Speak What They Need】- Please ensure you have taken out the transparent plastic insulation before using, or else it doesn’t work. Green light shows adequate nutrition and water, blue light displays your plants need water, lack nutrition is orange light. When your test kit is out of energy, the red light is on.

【☘️☘️Gardening Made Simple】- If the soil tester shows inadequate water or fertilizer and you don't know how much them should be added, you can refer Plant Encyclopedia or according to your daily planting experience to add water and fertilizer or download sPlant App for your reference.

【☘️☘️100% Quality Guarantee 】 - - All customers buy sPlant soil testers in our store, if there is any quality problem or any suggestion, please feel free to contact us. SPlant customer service team will reply you within 24 hours, we make sure you are 100% satisfied and pleasant with shopping experience! We take pride in getting things right!
